ext_descriptions.ext_description:
A Part is a type of Product that collects the definitional information of the versions of either a part or of a non-countable material.
A Part does not represent an object that is or was existing in the real world. Representation of such objects is the subject of the Product_as_realized module. A complex instance of the Part entity and of the Document entity may be created in order to represent a document that is a component of a manufactured product, for example a user manual of a car.
If the Part represents a non-countable material that is used as a component in an assembly, the Part shall be, in addition, referred to by a Product_category_association and the associated category shall have the name 'non-countable material'. This association is needed for a correct determination of the respective quantity of the components of the assembly.
The Part shall belong to a product category named 'part' or to a product category named 'raw material'.
A Part_version is a type of Product_version that identifies a version of a part. A Part_version is expected to be functionally and physically interchangeable with the other versions of the same Part.
The Part of which the Part_version specifies a version.
